featured.text: His recovery from the heart surgery was faster than Anthony’s.
According to the passage, what may be the author’s advice to a doctor before a surgery? (A) To provide the patient with more pain killers.
His heart transplant surgery was more successful than Anthony’s.
These methods 40 from a simple step like makeup to a drastic one like surgery.

definition.zh_def: 外科手術，通常指醫生對病人進行的操作，以治療疾病或損傷。
definition.en_def: A medical procedure involving an incision with instruments to repair damage or remove tissue.
definition.example: The patient will undergo surgery to repair the broken bone.
